comment_patterns.name: cmt_whole_fix
comment_patterns.title: Fix whole-line comments with 0-1 spaces to have 2 spaces
comment_patterns.description: Ensures whole-line comments have at least 2 spaces after -- (GNAT style)
comment_patterns.notes: Only fixes comments with 0-1 spaces, preserves 2+ spaces

comment_patterns.name: cmt_eol_fix
comment_patterns.title: Fix end-of-line comments with no space
comment_patterns.description: Ensures inline comments have at least 1 space after --
comment_patterns.notes: Only fixes comments with 0 spaces, preserves existing spacing

comment_patterns.name: cmt_preserve_art
comment_patterns.title: Skip ASCII art and separators
comment_patterns.description: Identifies comment lines that should not be reformatted
comment_patterns.notes: Preserves ASCII boxes, separators, and tree structures

rationale.cmt_whole_fix: GNAT -gnatyy requires exactly 2 spaces for whole-line comments but accepts more
rationale.cmt_eol_fix: GNAT -gnatyy requires at least 1 space for inline comments
rationale.cmt_preserve_art: ASCII art and visual separators should maintain their original formatting
